review: I only use it for Amazon Prime, but it works well. Only issue is that it stutters when paused. I have to mute the tv when I pause because it is so loud.

review: It's easy to install has great speed and easy to use, I like it very much.

review: I really like it - very easy to set up even for a senior citizen like me -I bought the voice activated remote and it really finds movies  very quickly and I then save them to my Watchlist  - there are some tv shows I wish were included with Prime without them charging but there are also many good free shows - I am happy I bought it - will take me a long time to watch all the movies available -

review: Some Applications work well for example music photos and old movies. On the other hand to subscribe to TV stations requires such a large subscription it's not close to being free. There should be some directions that would help a person get started like fires TV for dummies
